original_title: Comediants, amb el sol a la maleta
overview: "Comedians with the sun in a Suitcase" is the story of a theater company of Spain, which celebrates its 40th anniversary. A story about the fusion of life with the theater through its Mediterranean holiday spirit. A story about the inevitable clash between dreams and reality, where an airman make a link between the fantasy world of Comedians, illustrated with a story with puppets, shadow puppets and animation, and actually told by its protagonists.
title: Comediants, amb el sol a la maleta
